summary: This is an email dated April 27, 2021, from an unspecified sender to a recipient addressed as 'M.', requesting that attached confidential materials be added to the next production of 'NTW 3500' for an unspecified case or individual. The email includes two attachments labeled as confidential facts documents.
keyFacts: Email dated April 27, 2021, regarding the addition of confidential materials to a production labeled 'NTW 3500'.
The recipient is addressed as 'M.', but no full name is provided.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting it relates to discovery or evidence production in the legal proceedings.
The reference to '3500' likely pertains to Rule 3500 material (Jencks Act material) in federal criminal procedure.
